name: VASD
description:
Controls 

- Movement = W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys 

- Jump = Spacebar 

- Walk = Shift

The aim of the game is to reach the world by advancing without giving up against various obstacles. It is also our goal to finish the game in the fastest way on this difficult road.

This is your purpose

My main goal in this game is, Before seeing the end of the game, you have to get angry and give up.

You can race with each other with the timer.

      ( For mac and linux, the link will be shared after 1 week. )

( You can buy it to play on windows only for now. )
